column5: Friday is was 3.5-4.5......by monday I had the ATV out on 6" of good black ice.

Well I'm sure all of you know it was complete mayhem out there this weekend so I figured I'd put in my 2 cents worth. I went out the entire weekend, met some board members out there and fished with my "normal" fishin' buddy, Todd. Had a blast as always hooking into lots-o-lakers. Todd managed one whitey for table fare and I went 0-4 on the buggers. I know all of you like looking at the fish porn so here ya go. It's pic heavy and in no particular order. I also threw in a little video. It's my first attempt with Sony Vegas or any other editing software so be gentle!       Cheers,Colin
nice going guys
Those are some nice fish man!!!  Still gotta crack my Simcoe cherry this year.

beauty work, A1 vid in my mind, some nice looking fish. mostly on the grey silver tube?    and i can relate when you say your "normal" fishing buddy.  i think "usual" fishing buddy would suit mine a little better than "normal" haha.
Very true!!  They've been hitting the new TriggerX Goby tube like crazy!!
right on, anxious  for lakers to open here in zn11, feb 15th.
Thx Bill.....recognize the floater suit???? It's been a good luck charm.
Thx for the report. Just wonder if you caught lakers on bottom or off the bottom say 10 ft up?
It's got lots of good karma!!     Let's make sure we get out this year bud.
Great report and video , love the lakers   What do think of those rapala R type rods ? I guess it handled those lakers pretty good , I was thinking on getting one .
good job..thx for the report
For sure, Bill!

I'm loving the r-type rods. Grabbed 6 last year in various sizes. 32mh, 36h and 42h. I like the 32mh for in the hut and the 36h for outside. they have a great handle and big eyelets.....and tons of backbone.
Nice job on the fishing and camera work, brings back alot of memories as we used to live 3 miles from there and fished that area over a 20 year period  great job
Hey Colin  You guys put a beating on those 'Greasers'  Todd looks good hanging onto that Laker LOL  Good job on the Vid  Well Done Rick
Nice!!!
Eastern lands unknown, Time and man alone, Searching!!!!!............ and Xanadu(aKa-LT) found. Awesome report!! The lyrical mastery of that track is the cherry on top!! Thanks for sharing.
Awesome
One cannot beat RUSH at any time of the day.
great report
Beauties! That is an awesome day of fishing. I've never be able to go out for lakers on Simcoe... as I'm always heel-toeing my gear around. What kind of fishfinder are you using? Is it a humminbird?
Beauty Lakers!   Thanks for posting.   Think I'll wait for 2 more inches though =)
It's the Lowrance x67c.....
Always off bottom when using the tube.
Ice thickness??? 3"+-
